p: For willingness to donate, we again found a significant three-way interaction [ G 2(4) = 20.00, p < 0.001]. Moreover, liberals were more willing to donate than conservatives when the rising phase was highlighted ( X 2 = 13.03, p < 0.001), but there was no significant difference between liberals and conservatives when the flat phase was highlighted ( X 2 = 0.53, p = 0.47). This again suggests that liberals were more willing to donate when the rising phase was highlighted than when the flat phase was highlighted.
